body_html:
This can also be a gcc bug (there is even no skylake march option in this compiler), in this case there should be a way to disable avx512 support for older compilers.

I've sent a mail to eigen devel list describing this problem.

body:
This can also be a gcc bug (there is even no skylake march option in this compiler), in this case there should be a way to disable avx512 support for older compilers.

I've sent a mail to eigen devel list describing this problem.
